channel.title: Education on Kaho Abe 阿部香穂

item.title: Education
item.description: "Play is often talked about as if it were a relief from serious learning. But for children play is serious learning." -- Mister Rogers Teaching Artist Teaching is synonymous to sharing my practice as an artist. Consequently all my teaching content is based on the tools and the methods that I use to make art. My goal is to explore self-expression, encourage curiosity and to help find the clarity and enjoyment in the act of creating and building what is imagined.
